factoryName.metadata: データ ファクトリ名

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empId as short,
		{ name} as string,
		{ gendar} as string,
		{ age} as short,
		{ mail} as string,
		{ phoneNo} as string,
		{ salary} as integer,
		{ department} as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empSource
empSource filter(notEquals({ department}, 3)) ~> filterHrOut
filterHrOut derive({ phoneNo} = iif(isNull({ phoneNo}), 'unknown', { phoneNo}),
		{ gendar} = iif(isNull({ gendar}), 2, iif(equals({ gendar},'femail'), 0, 1))) ~> derive
derive sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: true,
	input(
		emp_id as integer,
		emp_name as string,
		gender as integer,
		age as integer,
		mail_address as string,
		phone_no as string,
		salary as integer,
		dep_id as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		emp_id = empId,
		emp_name = { name},
		age = { age},
		mail_address = { mail},
		dep_id = { department}
	)) ~> inserttossdb
